
```{r}
pressure <- read.table(url("https://github.com/UnicornParson/pyTest/raw/master/dataSet/pressure/data/pressure.csv"), header=TRUE, sep=";", dec=".")
```
#png("pressure.png",width=1920,height=1280)
```{r}

plot(pressure$pressure, axes=FALSE, type="l",col="red")
lines(pressure$temperature, col="green")
grid(nx=50, ny=50, col="#559999")
axis(2)
axis(1, at=pressure$id,labels=pressure$datetime, las=2)
```
